Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory279.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Stop it... I surrender...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lamia barely resists, surrendering immediately after being discovered.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Are you... really an Ascendant?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "What's the alternative? I'm not the fighting type... I'll probably hurt myself if I try.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "If you're surrendering, then tell us the way through the chasm.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "Heh... Isn't going after the Polyphage... more terrifying than death?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'You can let me know after you die here.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "Come on! I'm just joking—joking! Can you please, just please don't go toting your gun around, please...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "It won't help if I tell you anyway. The blockade here can only be disabled by an Ascendant, which means I'm coming with you!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "From what Strike Hawk reported, not only can she disguise herself, she can also turn invisible using optical camouflage, and vanish when we're distracted.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "I'm not going to run... Definitely not...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "And I definitely trust you. Liv, don't we have the mountaineering steel wire from the Support Force?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: '...Hey! What is this—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "It hurts! That's my tailfin! Have you Babylonians never learned how to properly tie up a mermaid?!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "I-I'm sorry... This is the first time I've seen a mermaid...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Don't apologize. Here, tighter.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Oh dear brother, it hurts so much... Please, let me go!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Ouch! Ouch! OUCH! Why is it getting tighter, my brother—', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "I'll remove all your scales if you pretend to be Murray again.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'After you finally tie Lamia up, you hear another massive quake coming from the underground cavern.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "Seems like... you didn't make it in time. Oops...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Let's investigate the epicenter of that quake. Liv, stay in the back and keep your eyes on Lamia. Get moving, mermaid.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "I'm moving, I'm moving! Gentler, please!", 4: '1'}
